EmailTemplate.name: 2024 - Schiavi - Fleet Buildings
EmailTemplate.subject: Affordable Modular Office Building for {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello! Are you looking for an affordable and efficient workspace solution?
Schiavi Leasing offers modular office buildings, perfect for your next project!
--> 60x12 Building With 3 Offices, 720 sq. ft. https://www.boxxmodular.com/used-modular/osw-02400-c/
--> 60x12 Building With Open Office Area, 720 sq.ft. https://www.boxxmodular.com/used-modular/osw-02401-d/
Visit our website today to explore the complete selection of modular solutions and our team will help you find the perfect fit for your needs.
--> View modular offices https://www.boxxmodular.com/offices/
To connect with us for more information: --> Reply to this email
--> Request a quote on our website https://www.boxxmodular.com/quote-request/
--> Call 207-539-821 to speak with one of our local experts
We are here to help!
Schiavi Leasing is a principal brand of BOXX Modular.
